Package space.sunqian.common.dynamic.aspect.asm

Class AsmAspectMaker

java.lang.Object
space.sunqian.common.dynamic.aspect.asm.AsmAspectMaker
All Implemented Interfaces:
AspectMaker
@ThreadSafe public class AsmAspectMaker extends Object implements AspectMaker
The ASM implementation for AspectMaker. This implementation uses the built-in asm package: space.sunqian.asm.

This implementation uses inheritance to implement proxy, just like the keywords: extends. That means the superclass, which is the advised class, cannot be final and must be inheritable, and must have an empty constructor to ensure that the AspectSpec.newInstance() can execute correctly. And only the methods, which can pass the ProxyKit.isProxiable(Method) and AspectHandler.needsAspect(Method), can be advised.

Note the generated aspect class is final.
